website_summaries.verdict: This solid performer boasts an attractive, sleek design and is loaded with features.
pros: Fast and versatile, this calculator is capable of figuring depreciation, amortization, interest, and much, more
cons: Not the right choice for highly complex computations

customer_reviews.title: Need commas!
customer_reviews.text: One thing I wish this displayed was a comma showing every thousand. I'm always counting the numerals for accuracy, the comma would simplify.
customer_reviews.author: Allan S. Jackman

customer_reviews.title: Great Price for a Very Capable Financial Calculator
customer_reviews.text: This calculator takes a little bit of getting used to, (I think I expect too much intuitiveness), but once you get the hang of it, it will save you tons of time doing compound interest and annuity calculations just b/c you're not as prone to fat fingering it or placing a parenthesis in the wrong place. Great calculator for accounting/statistics classes. Would definitely recommend to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Complicated, but it has it all
customer_reviews.text: More complicated than I like. But, this thing has everything you might ever need. I use the "Cost" feature the most. I like the multi lines. And can change an entry without having to start all over again. Dual powered, so I do not have to worry about the batteries going out. This is not something you can quickly take out on the dinner table. It takes work learning it. Thick little manual comes with it.
customer_reviews.author: D C McKay

customer_reviews.title: It still does not display commas
customer_reviews.text: It does not display digit separators in "computational" mode, which is ridiculous. Without commas, you must carefully count the digits to determine the actual number. In the financial modes, like 'simple interest,' it does display commas, which is good. If someone steals this, I will purchase something else.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Way better than Texas Instrument's last century calculator!
customer_reviews.text: I used FC 200V in my finance and accounting classes. Waaaaaaaaaaaaay better than BA-II Plus, which are antique and expensive. FC 200V can even tell you amortization of discount/premium for a specific period. By the way, for Time value of money questions, use [CMPD], which works exactly the same.
customer_reviews.author: Smily Mcjim

customer_reviews.title: zero stars if possible.
customer_reviews.text: zero starts if it were possible!! i purchased this calculator for school. and so far have only had two classes. so obviously not that much use out of it. I bought it in 01/2018 for a class. and then havent needed or used it since ( its 07/2018 now as i right this) i wasnt able to use the calculator at all. it was obviously charged because i could see the blue turn on but then just lines scroll and blink like white static on a bad tv channel. I am completely dissappointed and had express ship a new calculator (different brand this time) to be here in time for my next test for this course.
customer_reviews.author: Alisha Torrence

customer_reviews.title: Was recommended by Finance Professor
customer_reviews.text: Used it for all finance related classes at business school. Worked very well, no complaints in the past year.
customer_reviews.author: Bhawana

customer_reviews.title: The BEST financial calculator there is. Waaay better than Texas Instruments.
customer_reviews.text: The BEST financial calculator there is. Waaay better than Texas Instruments. TI is very hard to use, you have to memorize a lot of functions. This one has multi-line display, you just enter the function and key in the data on the screen. Just like a pocket computer. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: Alex Povolotski

customer_reviews.title: Great calculator but different than most.
customer_reviews.text: I'm studying finance and purchased this for my first finance class. It works great. The solar backup is convenient and gives me peace of mind during exams. This also has a much larger display than other brand's financial calculators. The only thing I would caution people about is that it is unlikely many of your instructors or fellow students have a Casio calculator, which means you'll need to spend a bit of time independently figuring some functions out.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Good tool for doing quick financial analysis
customer_reviews.text: I like the product. Currently using with a financial analysis course I am taking and does the job it was purchased to do. Easy to learn, accurate, flexible in doing several iterations to do 'what-if's' by changing variables. I do not do trig so I have no idea how that works. Chief usability feature - the screen is big enough to show the data as you set up the problem. It is a good product at a fair price. Solar charger and I have not had it long enough to know how long a charge lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great general purpose calculator for school, takes a while to figure out
customer_reviews.text: This is a great calculator: I use it in my MBA program with no issues. Some of the functions are tricky to figure our but once you get it there is no issue running the calculations. I also have a T.I. 89 Titanium and it is superior to this for doing financial computations, but I can not use that on exams (as it can take notes) but this works fine once figured out.
customer_reviews.author: jlloyd50

customer_reviews.title: Great product for my needs
customer_reviews.text: Great product for my needs. I'm used to using a TI-84 graphing calculator so the interface is quite different but not hard to learn. What I especially like it the multiple lined display. I have some friends with a single line display and it's very hard to understand what you're typing in.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hirsh

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Calculator
customer_reviews.text: I don't do anything fancy. It is pretty reliable and functional. I have one at work and at home. The battery gets drained very quickly though. Not much of an issue as replacements are cheap.
customer_reviews.author: James P

customer_reviews.title: Future value & compound interest calculations are very easy.
customer_reviews.text: This is making my CPCU classes so much easier. Anecdotally, I also answered a couple questions for curious family members about why they shouldn't take on a bunch of high interest credit cards to pay off a bunch of old debts in collections. Future value & compound interest calculations are very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine MacNeil

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I rather use casio than HP! This one is easier to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: good for the money but this product is difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: this is a good deal for a financial calculator, but it is hard to know how to use it because it doesnt come with good instructions. I bought and a week later, it was not working well, and i could not figure out how to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this calculator because of the many financial features it has to solve different calculation problems.
customer_reviews.author: DM_Consumer

customer_reviews.title: I love Casio and I have been making A's in my ...
customer_reviews.text: I love Casio and I have been making A's in my corporate finance class. This tool is easy to use and has lots of video tutorials on YouTube if you get lost. The only downfall is that it is better to download the user manual from the website as opposed to the one in the factory box. Trust me on this one.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Josche' Smith

customer_reviews.title: TI Who ?!?!
customer_reviews.text: Screw the TI calculators!! This thing is the easiest calculator to use and it allows you to see everything you have entered in a list that you can scroll through to double check your entries for errors. Once you go Casio you will never go back to TI.
customer_reviews.author: W. Humphrys

customer_reviews.title: Great but tough to learn
customer_reviews.text: I really like Casio calculators. Only problem is the steep learning curve to use this one. Overall, I would recommend this calculator to anyone looking for a financial calculator.
customer_reviews.author: MRyan84

customer_reviews.title: this help a lot
customer_reviews.text: this little calculator can do a lot of things more than finicial calculation it has a lot of equations and a lot of other math equations very easy to use and useful for many other things very good product for school and students 5 years later still working perfectly well.
customer_reviews.author: Kaung Kyaw

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This thing has as many keys as my computer does, but I am glad that I purchased it. As a student in Business Management, I wish that I would have purchased it sooner, because I think my grade would be a lot higher than it is. Thanks for offering a product that is cheap enough to afford on a Ramen Noodle budget.
customer_reviews.author: Norman Sills of Iowa

customer_reviews.title: Good little calculator
customer_reviews.text: This does a great job. It does have a very different format from traditional calculators, but once you get used to it, it you can do what you need to do faster than what you can do on traditional financial calculators. But don't expect anyone to guide you through this, you'll have to learn the new format on your own.
customer_reviews.author: m.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for College
customer_reviews.text: Casio is the choice in my college. I was undecided between Casio, Texas Instrumets or HP. But after using the scrolling button feature for over 4 years with the Casio fx series, I finally got the Casio. Very helpful in basic financial operations, such as cash flow, amortizations, etc. Also is very light weight. The only con is that its back has not anti-skid points, so it can easily slip off from your desk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I hate the ti thing
customer_reviews.text: I hate the ti thing. If you use it for your life. F200V is much better than Ba2 plus.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Nakamura

customer_reviews.title: Price/performance product financial calculator
customer_reviews.text: I bought it from Turkey. It came too fast. It's nice to have a connection between the functions. It makes things easier. The cover says the abbreviations. This is a very good thing. I advise. I have a recommendation for Casio. Please update the financial calculator. The 2000s are behind the design.
customer_reviews.author: Yağız Çelik

customer_reviews.title: Off does not mean off
customer_reviews.text: It is very cheaply made. I miss my Texas Instruments calculator.
customer_reviews.author: Hatalog

customer_reviews.title: You don't need to buy an HP.
customer_reviews.text: Most people get an HP but I like this better. It's very easy to learn, you have options of the way you input and I like the multiple lines screen.
customer_reviews.author: Angelynn

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Love that the screen is larger for a financial calculator and lets you see past calculations
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Van Engel

customer_reviews.title: Great calculator!
customer_reviews.text: Calculator works great. And the calculators are very durable, and easy to use. The calculator has a hard cover to protect the entire front of calculator.
customer_reviews.author: Liu Jinyuan

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Its a good product. Powerful enough for most applications yet easy enough to learn in a short period of time.
customer_reviews.author: I. Pompey

customer_reviews.title: Personal Finance
customer_reviews.text: The calculator took some getting used to, but I have figured out how to use it for my current financial needs.
customer_reviews.author: MaternalUnit

customer_reviews.title: Had to return
customer_reviews.text: It's a decent calculator, doesn't truly replace the BA-ii plus for business classes. Mine arrived and wouldn't stay powered on had to return.
customer_reviews.author: cshowilliams

customer_reviews.title: the product is excellent and the response by the seller is quite fast ...
customer_reviews.text: the product is excellent and the response by the seller is quite fast and effective, I recommend one hundred percent
customer_reviews.author: Carlos España

customer_reviews.title: A good calculator for the price
customer_reviews.text: I just purchased this item recently and haven't had time to explore everything it can do. I have only used it for basic calculations, but the numerals are easily readable and this calculator will do way more than I will ever need. So far, so good.
customer_reviews.author: Dave R

customer_reviews.title: Not bad calculator
customer_reviews.text: I rated this calculator 3 stars because its not good nor bad calculator. I wold give it 2.5. Main pluses: 4 line display to easly modify numbers and to be sure that entered numbers are correct. 2 modes for days: 360/y. and 365/y. It calculates annuity for cash flows at the beginning of period and at the end. Result can be ether % or ammount+%. Main minuses: Parameters for compound interest rate are comlicated. Most of functions are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Jemi

customer_reviews.title: Works for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter studies international business relations and she needs the calculator for the accounting classes. This is exactly what she needs. Works and Casio is a good brand in general in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Dani Schenker

customer_reviews.title: We don't need no stinkin' slide rules!
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift for my niece in Israel; she was thrilled and it was much cheaper through Amazon than it was anyplace in Israel
customer_reviews.author: L. Edward Domecq

customer_reviews.title: Great financial calculator!
customer_reviews.text: Studying on FINANCE & ECONOMICS, so I need these functions like compound interest, cash flow, something like that. The manual is a bit too thick considering the calculator is just so simple. Hope I can msster every littlr tricks this calculator provided.
customer_reviews.author: YuanGS

customer_reviews.title: great one
customer_reviews.text: much easier to use without any complications than texas or a lot of other brands, i recommend it, if you are not used to the casio calculators it will require you to go through the manual but after few days you will love it.
customer_reviews.author: mohamed

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: - - - It's very good and it was as described. If you buy you will not regret! - - -
customer_reviews.author: ggiorgi

customer_reviews.title: very useful and esasy to
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for college, very useful and esasy to use
customer_reviews.author: Melina Abarca

customer_reviews.title: Casio FC-200V Financial Calculator with 4-Line Display
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product for the accounting or finance student that has a great 4 line display, easy to learn menus and an overall functionality that will satisfy the needs of most users.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Scudgington

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for Accounting
customer_reviews.text: Great calculator for accounting students and professionals. Excellent income, taxes, interest tools. I'm from Uruguay and this is the one the teachers reccomend. And so I do.
customer_reviews.author: Mauricio Machado

customer_reviews.title: great financial calc
customer_reviews.text: it came with a worcking battery and everything works well, nice price range, good packaging, it came with a manual for better undestanding
customer_reviews.author: Nicolás Gaitan Solano

customer_reviews.title: Good! Note: built in calculations are different from other popular financial calculators
customer_reviews.text: I really like the multi-line display. However, the steps for built in financial functions are much different than how you do those same calculations on other (very popular) financial calculators. Besides having to get used to that, students should be aware of this since learning how to do these functions on another calculator will be very confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Excelent
customer_reviews.text: Get on time, excelent functional, the manual come with 3 lenguages (english, spanish and other). A little dificulted for who doesn't know this kind of calculater but, when you tried it, and learn how to used, it is so easy. It was so helpfull at school, I'm so glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Krmn Alva

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The quality of Casio is maintained over time Excellent calculator for accountant career, complete and tough.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos E

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Financial calculator for MBA courses....
customer_reviews.text: Many many times more user friendly for a user new to finance...Much simple and straightforward then TI product. Used both and had to return TI, kept Casio product. This is like a Nokia phone, very natural and intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: Devarshi A. Patel

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Calculator!
customer_reviews.text: The product is really original! I love my Casio FC-200V Financial 4-Line It cames in its box sealed! Recommended 100%
customer_reviews.author: Angel Eduardo Jaramillo Pérez

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: GOOD PRODUCT, I USE TO FINANCIAL MATHEMATICS AND IS VERY PRACTICAL. Would lack (,) FOR ZERO ELSE BUT THIS WELL.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis da Roza

customer_reviews.title: Worked great. If you are trying to get through accounting ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. If you are trying to get through accounting without one of these you are either crazy or just like to waste your own time.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Tefft

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! I got it before my exam. Easily use, especially to calculate cash flows.
customer_reviews.author: heidi

customer_reviews.title: Calculator review
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed and at such an affordable price compared to other substitute goods. The four line display makes it easy to view calculations made. Strongly recommended model when needing a financial calculator.
customer_reviews.author: Belpz

customer_reviews.title: casio the perfect calculator
customer_reviews.text: cause is the perfect calculator and it has the features i was looking for, is solar powered no batteries are needed
customer_reviews.author: juan pina

customer_reviews.title: Excelent product
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product, everything was in order, efficient and effective in sending to the destination
customer_reviews.author: Francisco

customer_reviews.title: I have used Casio forever now and Im very pleased with their products
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this calculator because i needed it for my studies. I have used Casio forever now and Im very pleased with their products. the only pretty big problem is that ive had this calculator for about a month now and the battery is already dead! ive had another casio (same one) for a few years and the battery is still running! Very disspointed about that!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this calculator
customer_reviews.text: Is really easy to use and it can lead you to the right answer. I use it almost every day in college
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I wish i went with something else
customer_reviews.text: It is very confusing to use. There is not enough room on the screen to see everything you are doing. Go with the Texas Instruments entry level financial calculator instead.
customer_reviews.author: smkindler

customer_reviews.title: Buy a TI or HP
customer_reviews.text: I own several financial calculators and this is by far the worst of the bunch. The TI BA II Plus or Plus Pro are my favorite but the HP 12c and 10bII Plus are both very good as well. The Casio is not intuitive and just a pain to use. To add 10% to 100 you need to type: 100+100*10[SHIFT]%[EXE]. That is just one example of the lack of thought that went into this device. This is very disappointing as I really like the larger display.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Looks good, just don't like the screen. In general, better than BA2 plus one.
customer_reviews.author: Rain Forest

customer_reviews.title: Great Value.
customer_reviews.text: I was truly looking forward to receiving this calculator which came very quickly. I needed it to replace my HP. What a manual. No key left unturned.
customer_reviews.author: Ed A

customer_reviews.title: The calculator is fine, but the instruction manual could be improved
customer_reviews.text: I use it to compute mortgage payments. The calculator is fine, but the instruction manual could be improved. I had to go online to figure out all of the steps necessary to do a calculation.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: It's a financial calculator and does what it is supposed ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a financial calculator and does what it is supposed to. You might need to read the manual to figure some of the things out though.
customer_reviews.author: S. Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I only had to use it once and it served the purpose
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed, item just as described. Prompt service. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: L.Keith

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This calculator made finance one of the easiest classes I have taken in college.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Ulisney

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This calculator is not comparable with the Texas Instruments financial calculator!
customer_reviews.author: Kari C.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect ballance price-functions
customer_reviews.text: Excellent consultant for the price. It have all the functions i need and more!! I'm so glad with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Javier Viquez Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Quite good
customer_reviews.text: Quite a good product, missing a couple functions, you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Juan Hess

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and time. Too complicated to use.
customer_reviews.text: No TMV button!! useless for MBA Financial calculations. Very complicated to use. HP models are way better.
customer_reviews.author: BSN2MBA

customer_reviews.title: too complicated to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this calculator to be a cheap replacement over the most common HP models. Being a business student, I needed to do certain financial calculations, but I did not like the way built-in functions were presented. I guess I'm used to the old, more simplistic style of entering data. Love the big display though.
customer_reviews.author: Istvan

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: For some reason you can not set the calculator to use comma separators for normal adding, subtracting etc. which ends up being the majority of use no matter how sophisticated your needs are.
customer_reviews.author: nathwins

customer_reviews.title: waste of money or im just a fool
customer_reviews.text: I thought it was like the one that i had lost, but NOOOO it's so annoying to use! I feel like it was a waste to have bought this calc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the calculator came like suppossed to be
customer_reviews.text: Yes, the calculator came like suppossed to be .. OK.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Garcia

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Not very user friendly and return policy from vendor isn't very fair. Be careful what you buy, I guess.
customer_reviews.author: rachespy

customer_reviews.title: Best price value Financial Calculator
customer_reviews.text: Incredible good calculator for the price! And YES! FINANCIAL! Calculator!! Easy to use and very good quality too. Manual in Spanish English and
customer_reviews.author: Luis A. Gomez Espinoza

product_meta.title: Casio FC-200V Financial Calculator with 4-Line Display
product_meta.description: Powerful, original financial features take much of the work out of financial calculations. Direct mode key and new operation. The FC-200V incorporates a full-dot 4-line display allowing easy input, confirmation, change and correction of each parameter. This also offers the very convenient 3-digit, comma-markers display function. Depreciation, Bond calculation, Break-even point calculation. Simple interest calculation. Compound interest calculation. Conversion between nominal interest rate and effective interest rate.
feature_bullets: Design that delivers High availability, scalability, and for maximum flexibility and price/performance
Converts between percentage interest rate and effective interest rate
Simple and compound interest calculations, depreciation
Slide-on hard case; solar power with battery back-up

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars424 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
